snippet: Husband-and-wife businesses can survive even if the marriage does not. It takes discipline, counseling and plenty of communication.
abstract: Husband-and-wife businesses can survive even if couples divorce; small-business guide offers suggestions, including discipline, counseling and plenty of communication.
lead_paragraph: Husband-and-wife businesses can survive even if the marriage does not. It takes discipline, counseling and plenty of communication.

headline.seo: When Couples Divorce but Still Run the Business Together
headline.main: When Couples Divorce but Still Run a Business Together
headline.print_headline: When Couples Divorce But Still Run A Business Together
